title: Chicken, buttermilk and wild garlic pie
description: Wild garlic, chicken and buttermilk make a delicious springtime pie. Gizzi cooked this live at the National Festival of Making in Blackburn. Equipment: You will need a food processor and a 23cm/9in pie dish.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
420g/15oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
250g/9oz ice cold unsalted butter, cut into cubes
